segments.text: Hey , Cindy , I ’ m so sorry about yesterday . I shouldn ’ t have yelled at you in front of everyone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know what happened to me . I just lost it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you just need to get more sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you ’ re right . Good night .
segments.speaker: S1
